entry.title: Awesome Home Assistant Updates on Sep 25, 2019
entry.content:
In case you need help / Official Communities

  • Home Assistant Discord - Join the chat, most of us are there.
  • Home Assistant Community - The discussion forum, also used for feature requests.
  • Home Assistant Subreddit - If you are into Reddit, subscribe.

In case you need help / Other Communities

  • Dr. ZZs - Facebook group by Dr. Zzs.
  • ESPHome Discord - Get support for your DIY ESPHome project.

Public Configurations / Other Communities

  • Carlo Costanzo (‚≠ê5k) - Probably the most documented configuration out there.
  • DubhAd (‚≠ê655) - Also known as Tinkerer shares his configuration files.
  • geekofweek (‚≠ê1.4k) - Has over 300+ automations.
  • Mahasri Kalavala (‚≠ê271) - Impressive setup, with lots of different hardware working together.
  • Alok Saboo (‚≠ê1.9k) - Also known as arsaboo. Regularly updated.
  • Aaron Bach (‚≠ê278) - Also known as bachya. Regularly updated and includes numerous Dockerized services.
  • Franck Nijhof (‚≠ê1.9k) - Hass.io based, very different configuration structure compared to others.

Add-ons / Third Party Add-ons

  • SSH & Web Terminal (‚≠ê423) - SSH and Web-based terminal with tons of pre-loaded useful tools.
  • UniFi Controller (‚≠ê309) - The UniFi Controller allows you to manage your UniFi network using a web browser.
  • Node-RED (‚≠ê584) - Flow-based programming for the Internet of Things.
  • Plex Media Server (‚≠ê170) - Your recorded media beautifully organized and ready to stream.
  • IDE (‚≠ê61) - Advanced web-based IDE, based on Cloud9 IDE.
  • Dasshio (‚≠ê201) - Easily use your Amazon Dash Buttons.
  • InfluxDB (‚≠ê176) - Scalable datastore for metrics, events, and real-time analytics.
  • Grafana (‚≠ê255) - Open platform for beautiful analytics and monitoring.
  • Tor (‚≠ê56) - Protect your privacy and access your instance via Tor.
  • Spotify Connect (‚≠ê226) - Spotify Connect client for playing music on your Home Assistant device.
  • zigbee2mqtt (‚≠ê568) - Zigbee to MQTT bridge, get rid of your proprietary Zigbee bridges.
  • TasmoAdmin (‚≠ê246) - Centrally manage all your Sonoff-Tasmota devices.
  • Aircast (‚≠ê356) - AirPlay capabilities for your Chromecast players.
  • AirSonos (‚≠ê96) - AirPlay capabilities for your Sonos players.
  • Dropbox Sync (‚≠ê134) - Upload your backup snapshots to Dropbox.
  • Log Viewer (‚≠ê85) - Browser-based live log viewing utility.
  • Tautulli (‚≠ê43) - Monitor and get statistics from your Plex server.
  • motionEye (‚≠ê306) - Simple, elegant and feature-rich CCTV/NVR for your cameras.
  • Backup to Google Drive (‚≠ê92) - Backup snapshots to Google Drive.
  • Glances (‚≠ê167) - A cross-platform system monitoring tool written in Python.
  • Matrix (‚≠ê52) - A secure and decentralized communication platform.
  • AdGuard Home (‚≠ê460) - A network-wide ad-and-tracker blocking DNS server with parental control.
  • Traccar (‚≠ê137) - Traccar is modern GPS Tracking Platform.
  • Home Panel (‚≠ê247) - A touch-compatible web frontend for controlling the home.
  • Hass.io Google Drive Backup (‚≠ê3.4k) - A complete and easy to configure solution for backing up your snapshots to Google Drive.
  • Grocy (‚≠ê382) - ERP beyond your fridge! A groceries & household management solution for your home.

Dashboards / Third Party Add-ons

  • üì∫ Getting started with Lovelace UI - Great introduction to Lovelace UI by DrZzs.
  • Share the Love - Custom card demos and configuration examples for Lovelace.
  • üì∫ How to set up Lovelace - Excellent step by step video for beginners by JuanMTech.

Dashboards / Icon packs

  • Font Awesome Icons (‚≠ê333) - Use the free icons from Font Awesome in your frontend.

Dashboards / Themes

  • Midnight - A dark theme by Marcel Hoffs.
  • Dark Cyan - A dark theme with cyan accents by Ryoen Deprouw.
  • Grey Night - A dark theme with grey accents by ksya.
  • Dark Red - A dark theme with red accents by Ryoen Deprouw.
  • Halloween - Pumpkins colored by Mahasri Kalavala.
  • Black and Green - A dark theme with pale green accents by GreenTurtwig.
  • Vintage - Give your frontend a vintage look with this theme by Anup Surendran.
  • Carbon Green - Light carbon theme with green accents by Reua.
  • Many Themes, One Repo (‚≠ê206) - 13 Themes in a convenient ZIP file.

Dashboards / Custom Cards

  • Canvas Gauge Card (‚≠ê203) - Use awesome gauges from canvas-gauges.com.
  • Mini Media Player (‚≠ê1.6k) - A minimalistic media player card.
  • Mini Graph Card (‚≠ê3.5k) - A minimalistic sensor graph card.
  • Button card (‚≠ê2.2k) - Button card for your entities.
  • Slider Entity Row (‚≠ê871) - Add a slider to adjust, e.g., the brightness of lights in lovelace entity cards.
  • Power Wheel Card (‚≠ê176) - An intuitive way to represent the power that your home is consuming or producing.
  • Simple Thermostat (‚≠ê768) - A simpler and more flexible thermostat card.
  • Bar Card (‚≠ê432) - Customizable animated bar card.
  • forked-daapd Card (‚≠ê78) - Control a forked daapd instance.
  • Dual Gauge Card (‚≠ê210) - Shows two gauges in one.
  • Xiaomi Vacuum Card (‚≠ê272) - Detailed card for Xiaomi vacuum cleaners (and others).
  • Simple Weather Card (‚≠ê321) - A minimalistic weather card, inspired by Google Material Design.
  • Home Card (‚≠ê195) - A quick glance of the state of your home.
  • Banner Card (‚≠ê659) - A fluffy linkable banner with interactive glances to spice up your home dashboards.
  • Spotify Card (‚≠ê394) - List and select from current available devices and users top playlists on Spotify.
  • Battery Entity (‚≠ê222) - Displaying battery levels for battery entities.
  • Multiple Entity Row (‚≠ê883) - Show multiple entity states or attributes on entity rows.
  • Home Feed Card (‚≠ê287) - Display a combination of persistent notifications, calendar events, and entities in the style of a feed.
  • Config Template Card (‚≠ê506) - Allow using templates in Lovelace.

Dashboards / Alternative Dashboards

  • TileBoard (‚≠ê1.6k) - A simple yet highly configurable Dashboard.

Custom Integrations / Alternative Dashboards

  • Lutron Caseta Pro (‚≠ê183) - Integrates Lutron Caseta Smart Bridge PRO / RA2 Select.
  • SmartIR (‚≠ê2.3k) - Integrates devices using Broadlink IR.
  • Xiaomi Hygrothermo (‚≠ê88) - Sensor platform for Xiaomi Mijia BT Hygrothermo temperature and humidity sensor.
  • Volkswagen Carnet (‚≠ê403) - Integrates Volkswagen Carnet (requires valid Carnet subscription).
  • Untappd (‚≠ê38) - Connects with your Untappd account.
  • Elasticsearch (‚≠ê158) - Publishes events to Elasticsearch.
  • Alexa Media Player (‚≠ê15) - Allow control of Amazon Alexa devices.
  • iCloud3 (‚≠ê694) - Improved version of the iCloud device tracker component with a lot of capabilities.
  • Circadian Lighting (‚≠ê827) - Circadian Lighting slowly synchronizes your color changing lights with the regular naturally occuring color temperature of the sky throughout the day.
  • HASS Aarlo (‚≠ê429) - Asynchronous Arlo integration. Similar to the Arlo web site; monitors events and states for all base stations, cameras and doorbells.

DIY / Alternative Dashboards

  • ESPHome - Program ESP8266 boards and ESP32 boards using YAML.
  • Magic Cards (‚≠ê593) - RFID scannable cards that you can program to do anything.

DIY / DIY Gateways

  • OpenMQTTGateway (‚≠ê3.8k) - A flexible MQTT gateway for IR, RF, BLE, MiFlora, SMS, and many sensors.
  • esp8266 Milight Hub (‚≠ê983) - Alternative hub for Milight/LimitlessLED devices that uses MQTT.
  • zigbee2mqtt (‚≠ê14k) - Zigbee to MQTT bridge, get rid of your proprietary Zigbee bridges.

DIY / DIY Projects

  • HA SwitchPlate - LCD Touchscreen wall switch replacement.
  • üì∫ DIY Multisensor - $15, Temperature, Humidity, Light, Motion, and RGB LED, without soldering.
  • $10 WiFi RGB Bulb - In inexpensive RGB bulb that works on WiFi.
  • 433mhz/IR Bidirectional Gateway - Bidirectional with IR and 433mhz using ESP8266 and MQTT.
  • esp8266MQTTBlinds - Automate your window blinds using an ESP8266, a servo and MQTT.
  • Home Assistant's Hackster.io - A Hackster channel with multiple DIY projects.
  • ESP MQTT Digital LEDs (‚≠ê515) - WS2811 LED Stripe for the JSON Light Component from BRUH.
  • Bed Presence Detection - ESP8266 based Bed Presence Detection.
  • NFC Scanner (‚≠ê80) - Build an NFC tag/card scanner with an ESP8266, PN532 and MQTT.
  • ESP32-Cam Facebox - Tie a ESP32-CAM, HA, and Facebox together for a cheap Facial Recog / Home monitoring solution.

Online Resources / Blogs

  • DIY Futurism - Brad posts articles with great instructions for new users.
  • Phil Hawthorne - Co-host of the Home Assistant Podcast.
  • Smart Home Hobby - Features budget friendly guides and information.
  • Self Hosted Home - Articles on DIY home automation projects and self hosted services.
  • Tinkering with Home Automation - Tinkerer's blog and guides.
  • HomeTechHacker - DIY Smarthome guides, reviews, and advice.
  • Intermittent Technology - Quindor's personal blog for pasting random (mostly technology related) things.

Online Resources / YouTube Channels

  • BRUH - Ben has great tutorials for getting started, unfortunately, inactive lately.
  • BurnsHA - Great informational and tutorial videos.
  • DrZzs - Great how-to videos and also streams live.
  • The Hook Up - Tutorials and more, also has videos on home automation in general.
  • HASSCASTS - Tips, Tricks & Tutorials, moving to mainly live streams.
  • JuanMTech - Easy to follow how-to videos, product reviews and more.
  • vCloudInfo - Publishes videos based on his home and GitHub repository.
  • digiblurDIY - Tutorials on hardware projects and Tasmota automations.
  • Intermit.Tech - Tutorials & reviews: Camera's, Home Networking, ESP8266 boards, Node-RED.

Online Resources / Podcasts

  • Home Assistant Podcast - Biweekly podcast with the latest news and interesting guests.

Online Resources / Twitter

  • @home_assistant - Open source home automation that puts local control and privacy first.
  • @hass_devs - Latest news on the development of Home Assistant for contributors.
  • @balloob - Founder of the Home Assistant project.

  • @hassioaddons - For all commmunity add-on news and updates.
  • @Dr_Zzs - Great how-to videos and also streams live.
